updatecontent.item: Less heavy heightmap (tilesize = 85, previous tile size was 128)

currentFeatures.item: A warehouse with a bunch of boxes and shelves (dynamic)
Some outside props (there will be more than this)
2 differents heightmaps to play the map with (Added a smaller one so you can spawn planes)
Fire alarm for the office & warehouse building

updatecontent.item: Fixed again warehouse not having furnitures, for "only offce & warehouse" option (I'm stupid lmao)
Next version will have new things to the map
